Lithographer: Lithography by Lindner, Eddy & Claus (American, New York)
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "The World's Racers" series (N32), issued in 1888 in a set of 50 cards to promote Allen & Ginter brand cigarettes.
